item.description:
Someone suggested Derry Dog Park, and I know everyone who has gone there, liked it. So let's go there while the weather is good!

Speaking of weather, this Meetup will be held in Derry if it's sunny, overcast or drizzling. Rain will cancel. If you are unsure, please check the website before you leave. I'll try to confirm by 11:00 am that morning whether the Meetup is on or off.


***** Please bring plenty of pooper-scooper bags to pick up after your dog!! *****

Thanks!
-laura

group.name: Cavalier King Charles Spaniel Lovers of MA

item.name: North Shore Cavalier King Charles Spaniel August Meetup
